Package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.table.service

Interface TableService

All Known Implementing Classes:
TableServiceImpl
public interface TableService
Service interface defining operations for interacting with table components.

This interface provides methods for reading tables, retrieving rows, inserting values, filtering, and sorting table data dynamically.

Author:
Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª

    Default table component type used when none is specified.

    • readTable

      default <T> List<T> readTable(Class<T> clazz)

      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the row representation.
      Parameters:
      clazz - The class type representing the table rows.
      Returns:
      A list of objects representing table rows.

      Type Parameters:

      Parameters:
      clazz - The class type representing the table rows.
      fields - The fields to be extracted from the table.
      Returns:

      default <T> List<T> readTable(int start, int end, Class<T> clazz)
      Reads a specific range of rows from the table.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the row representation.
      Parameters:
      start - The starting row index (inclusive, 1-based index).
      end - The ending row index (exclusive, 1-based index).
      clazz - The class type representing the table rows.
      Returns:
      A list of objects representing the selected rows.

    • readTable

      default <T> List<T> readTable(int start, int end, Class<T> clazz, TableField<T>... fields)
      Reads a specific range of rows from the table with only the specified fields.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the row representation.
      Parameters:
      start - The starting row index (inclusive, 1-based index).
      end - The ending row index (exclusive, 1-based index).
      clazz - The class type representing the table rows.
      fields - The fields to be extracted from the table. If not provided, all fields are retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of objects representing the selected rows with chosen fields.

    • readTable

      <T> List<T> readTable(TableComponentType tableComponentType, int start, int end, Class<T> clazz, TableField<T>... fields)
      Reads a specific range of rows from the table with only the specified fields using a specific table component type.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the row representation.
      Parameters:
      tableComponentType - The type of the table component.
      start - The starting row index (inclusive, 1-based index).
      end - The ending row index (exclusive, 1-based index).
      clazz - The class type representing the table rows.
      fields - The fields to be extracted from the table. If not provided, all fields are retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of objects representing the selected rows with chosen fields.

    • readRow

      default <T> T readRow(List<String> searchCriteria, Class<T> clazz)
      Reads a single row from the table based on search criteria.

      This method searches for a row that matches the given criteria and returns it as an object of the specified class.

      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the row representation.
      Parameters:
      searchCriteria - A list of string values used to identify the row.
      clazz - The class type representing the table row.
      Returns:
      An object representing the row matching the search criteria.

    • readRow

      <T> T readRow(TableComponentType tableComponentType, List<String> searchCriteria, Class<T> clazz)
      Reads a single row from the table based on search criteria for a specific table component type.

      This method searches for a row that matches the given criteria within the specified table component and returns it as an object of the provided class.

      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the row representation.
      Parameters:
      tableComponentType - The type of the table component.
      searchCriteria - A list of string values used to identify the row.
      clazz - The class type representing the table row.
      Returns:
      An object representing the row matching the search criteria.

    • readRow

      default <T> T readRow(int row, Class<T> clazz, TableField<T>... fields)
      Reads a single row from the table using a 1-based index and retrieves only the specified fields.

      This method extracts a row from the table using the given row index and retrieves only the specified fields from the row.

      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the row representation.
      Parameters:
      row - The 1-based index of the row to retrieve.
      clazz - The class type representing the table row.
      fields - The fields to extract from the row. If not provided, all fields are retrieved.
      Returns:
      An object representing the row with the chosen fields.

    • readRow

      <T> T readRow(TableComponentType tableComponentType, int row, Class<T> clazz, TableField<T>... fields)
      Reads a single row from the table using a 1-based index with a specified table component type.

      This method extracts a row from a table component using the given row index and retrieves only the specified fields.

      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the row representation.
      Parameters:
      tableComponentType - The type of the table component.
      row - The 1-based index of the row to retrieve.
      clazz - The class type representing the table row.
      fields - The fields to extract from the row. If not provided, all fields are retrieved.
      Returns:
      An object representing the row with the chosen fields.

    • readRow

      default <T> T readRow(List<String> searchCriteria, Class<T> clazz, TableField<T>... fields)
      Reads a single row from the table based on search criteria and retrieves only the specified fields.

      This method searches for a row that matches the given criteria and extracts only the specified fields.

      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the row representation.
      Parameters:
      searchCriteria - A list of string values used to identify the row.
      clazz - The class type representing the table row.
      fields - The fields to extract from the row. If not provided, all fields are retrieved.
      Returns:
      An object representing the row matching the search criteria with chosen fields.

    • readRow

      <T> T readRow(TableComponentType tableComponentType, List<String> searchCriteria, Class<T> clazz, TableField<T>... fields)
      Reads a single row from the table based on search criteria using a specified table component type.

      This method searches for a row that matches the given criteria within the specified table component and extracts only the specified fields.

      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the row representation.
      Parameters:
      tableComponentType - The type of the table component.
      searchCriteria - A list of string values used to identify the row.
      clazz - The class type representing the table row.
      fields - The fields to extract from the row. If not provided, all fields are retrieved.
      Returns:
      An object representing the row matching the search criteria with chosen fields.

    • insertCellValue

      default <T> void insertCellValue(int row, Class<T> classType, T data)
      Inserts values into a specific row in the table.

      This method inserts values into the fields of a specified row in the table using the default table component type.

      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the row representation.
      Parameters:
      row - The 1-based index of the row where values should be inserted.
      classType - The class type representing the table row.
      data - The object containing the values to insert.

    • insertCellValue

      <T> void insertCellValue(TableComponentType tableComponentType, int row, Class<T> classType, T data)
      Inserts values into a specific row in the table using a specified table component type.

      This method inserts values into the fields of a specified row in the table for a given table component type.

      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the row representation.
      Parameters:
      tableComponentType - The type of the table component.
      row - The 1-based index of the row where values should be inserted.
      classType - The class type representing the table row.
      data - The object containing the values to insert.

    • insertCellValue

      default <T> void insertCellValue(int row, Class<T> classType, TableField<T> field, String... values)
      Inserts values into a specific cell in the table.

      This method inserts values into a particular field of a specified row.

      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the row representation.
      Parameters:
      row - The 1-based index of the row where the values should be inserted.
      classType - The class type representing the table row.
      field - The field in which values should be inserted.
      values - The values to insert into the field.

    • insertCellValue

      default <T> void insertCellValue(int row, Class<T> classType, TableField<T> field, int index, String... value)
      Inserts values into a specific indexed cell within a row in the table.

      This method inserts values into a specified field of a row at a particular index position.

      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the row representation.
      Parameters:
      row - The 1-based index of the row where the values should be inserted.
      classType - The class type representing the table row.
      field - The field in which values should be inserted.
      index - The 1-based index of the cell within the field.
      value - The values to insert into the field at the given index.

    • insertCellValue

      <T> void insertCellValue(TableComponentType tableComponentType, int row, Class<T> classType, TableField<T> field, int index, String... value)
      Inserts values into a specific indexed cell within a row in the table using a specified table component type.

      This method inserts values into a specified field of a row at a particular index position for a given table component type.

      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the row representation.
      Parameters:
      tableComponentType - The type of the table component.
      row - The 1-based index of the row where the values should be inserted.
      classType - The class type representing the table row.
      field - The field in which values should be inserted.
      index - The 1-based index of the cell within the field.
      value - The values to insert into the field at the given index.

    • insertCellValue

      default <T> void insertCellValue(List<String> searchCriteria, Class<T> classType, TableField<T> field, String... values)
      Inserts a value into a specific cell in the table based on search criteria.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the row representation.
      Parameters:
      searchCriteria - The criteria used to locate the row.
      classType - The class type representing the table row.
      field - The field representing the cell.
      values - The values to be inserted into the cell.

    • insertCellValue

      default <T> void insertCellValue(TableComponentType tableComponentType, List<String> searchCriteria, Class<T> classType, TableField<T> field, String... values)
      Inserts values into a specific cell in a row that matches the search criteria.

      This method inserts values into a particular field of a row that matches the given search criteria using a specified table component type. It defaults to inserting at the first available index.

      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the row representation.
      Parameters:
      tableComponentType - The type of the table component.
      searchCriteria - A list of string values used to identify the row.
      classType - The class type representing the table row.
      field - The field in which values should be inserted.
      values - The values to insert into the field.

    • insertCellValue

      default <T> void insertCellValue(List<String> searchCriteria, Class<T> classType, TableField<T> field, int index, String... values)
      Inserts values into a specific indexed cell within a row that matches the search criteria.

      This method inserts values into a particular field of a row that matches the given search criteria using the default table component type at a specified cell index.

      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the row representation.
      Parameters:
      searchCriteria - A list of string values used to identify the row.
      classType - The class type representing the table row.
      field - The field in which values should be inserted.
      index - The 1-based index of the cell within the field.
      values - The values to insert into the field at the given index.

    • filterTable

      default <T> void filterTable(Class<T> tclass, TableField<T> column, FilterStrategy filterStrategy, String... values)
      Filters the table based on a specified field and filter strategy.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the row representation.
      Parameters:
      tclass - The class type representing the table row.
      column - The field representing the column to be filtered.
      filterStrategy - The strategy used for filtering (e.g., SELECT_ONLY, UNSELECT_ALL).
      values - The values to filter.

    • filterTable

      <T> void filterTable(TableComponentType tableComponentType, Class<T> tclass, TableField<T> column, FilterStrategy filterStrategy, String... values)
      Filters the table based on a specified field and filter strategy.

      This method applies the provided FilterStrategy to the given TableField for a table component of the specified type, including only rows that match one or more of the supplied values.

      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the row representation.
      Parameters:
      tableComponentType - The type of the table component to filter.
      tclass - The class type representing the table rows.
      column - The field (column) on which to apply the filter.
      filterStrategy - The filtering strategy to use (e.g., SELECT_ONLY, UNSELECT_ALL).
      values - The values to filter by.

    • sortTable

      default <T> void sortTable(Class<T> tclass, TableField<T> column, SortingStrategy sortingStrategy)
      Sorts the table based on a specified field and sorting strategy.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the row representation.
      Parameters:
      tclass - The class type representing the table row.
      column - The field representing the column to be sorted.
      sortingStrategy - The sorting strategy (e.g., ascending or descending).

    • sortTable

      <T> void sortTable(TableComponentType tableComponentType, Class<T> tclass, TableField<T> column, SortingStrategy sortingStrategy)
      Sorts the table based on the specified column and sorting strategy.

      This method applies sorting to a table based on the given column and sorting strategy, using the specified table component type.

      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the row representation.
      Parameters:
      tableComponentType - The type of the table component.
      tclass - The class type representing the table rows.
      column - The column to be sorted.
      sortingStrategy - The sorting strategy to be applied (e.g., ascending or descending).

    • validate

      <T> List<io.cyborgcode.roa.validator.core.AssertionResult<T>> validate(Object table, io.cyborgcode.roa.validator.core.Assertion... assertions)
      Validates a table against a set of assertions.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the table rows.
      Parameters:
      table - The table object to validate.
      assertions - The assertions to apply.
      Returns:
      A list of assertion results.
